EmailTemplate.name: NEW REQUEST FROM MEMBER
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: Recent ICCU Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
We will need to speak with you first to properly verify your identity to provide further information, as this is a new request. You can reach us at 1-800-456-5067 or chat in via eBranch.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We appreciate your membership. Have a wonderful day.
Thank you,
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName}
Idaho Central Credit Union
P.O. Box 2469
Pocatello, ID 83206
d: (208) 239-3000 | f: (208) 239-3055
